permit_requirements.title: Business License
permit_requirements.description: Valid business license issued by Denver Department of Licensing
validation_criteria: License type must match business activity

permit_requirements.title: Food Safety Inspection
permit_requirements.description: Current food safety inspection certificate from Denver Health Department
validation_criteria: Inspection must be within last 12 months

permit_requirements.title: Affidavit of Commissary
permit_requirements.description: Signed affidavit confirming commissary kitchen arrangement

permit_requirements.title: Zoning Permit
permit_requirements.description: Authorization to operate in designated zones

permit_requirements.title: Fire Department Inspection
permit_requirements.description: Fire safety inspection and approval for mobile food unit

compliance_rules.description: All required documents must be present and current
compliance_rules.validation: Document presence and expiration date check

compliance_rules.description: Commissary kitchen must be within 25 miles of operating area
Food truck must have valid commercial auto insurance
